description: found no direct installable s/w for linux that can print pages direcly using old printers. This browser based open software just does the job. thank you very much

The best Printer Snap(App) for Linux, Apple & for the terrible OS(Win) 

Thank you & Hats-off the Developer(s) at OpenPrinting!
summary: The Best! Thank You Devs OpenPrinting!

description: Once you understand how CUPS snap works and the use of Applications instead of "drivers", it is very good, this help me to add my EPSON L3150 easily.
Well at least I was able to print something, I was only able to print test pages from the local host site. Couldn't "ADD" in printer settings to print anything else.

Searched linux and websites for DAYS and finally discovered this app on my own. The printer worked on Bionic Beaver but not Focal Fossa, so I reverted to 18.04, which is when I searched the Ubuntu Software on my own. At first, the app said it failed, so I clicked it again and it went through. From there, plug and play, LibreOffice Writer made it go!
Believe me, I am SO grateful- the new ink cartridges set me back almost $60. and I really needed the print outs. THANK YOU!
After the upgrade to 22.04 LTS my Canon USB printer was printing in BW only. https://localhost:8000/, add new printer, then all other aps can print in colour mode when requested
Completely useless to me: when I launch the software, a terminal window flashes for a split second and disappears. That's it. No software at all.

Same problem I've had with other drivers for the iP90 in Linux, it prints everything from the page lightly on the first line, than rejects the sheet of paper, thinks about it for a while then rejects the next page, and so on. The most I've allowed it to spit out is 25 pages, all with that lightly printed first line.

This driver will not work with the iP90 (which are still sold because it's a compact, carry in your luggage or backpack full width color printer).
apres avoir telecharger l'application j'ai beau cliquer sur ouvrir cela ne fonctionne pas

Hyper simple à installer et à configurer. J'avais des soucis avec mon imprimante/scanneur epson stylus SX535WD et avec gutenprint tout est rentré dans l'ordre. L'imprimante est systématiquement reconnue.
